column2: # Calculate the percentage of alcohol consumption by education level
summarise(count = n(), .groups = 'drop') %>% # Ensure groupings are dropped after summarise
# Define the order of education levels
"Some college or university, no certificate or degree",
"Left school at 18 years", "Left school at 17 years",
"Left school at 16 years", "Left school before 16 years"
ggplot(education_alcohol_counts, aes(x = "", y = percentage, fill = Alcohol)) +
facet_wrap(~ Education, ncol = 3) + # Adjust the number of columns as needed
scale_fill_manual(values = custom_colours) + # Use the custom colours
colour = "white", size = 2.5) + # Adjust text size and colour
plot.margin = margin(20, 20, 20, 20, "mm"), # Adjust plot margins for better display
axis.text.x = element_blank(), # Remove x-axis labels (radial lines indicating percentages)
